channel.title: Gloria - Needs Server, Client and website developers
channel.description:
Gloria is gonna be re-make of RS, a 2012 version im using 718 which is loading 742 cache. I've started the project already added small things and been fixing bugs and dupes.
Why isn't this like other servers? You know, since EOC landed in the RuneScape developers of Gloria started to create RS without eoc, we are aiming to re-make everything. You remember... how fun it was to pk at revs? people around the world, skilling, training, doing daily challenges, bonfire or just chilling out. Remember how cool it was to hybrid? We have brought them back.
[b]To talk more with me, heres my details to contact me:[/b] Skype: NexonLTD MSN: Paras-Best@hotmail.com

item.title: Gloria - Needs Server, Client and website developers
item.dc:creator: @MentiosRSPS MentiosRSPS
item.description:
@MentiosRSPS wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:2, topic:472186”][quote author=MentiosRSPS link=topic=589900.msg4177295#msg4177295 date=1355123071]
You remember… how fun it was to pk at revs?
[/quote]

I remember how annoying it was having asshole’s pk me while I was trying to kill Revs.[/quote]
Haha i know the feeling also, but pking there with friends and skype is awesome also. Haha

Read full topic
item.source: Gloria - Needs Server, Client and website developers
